casebody.data:
UNITED STATES of America Plaintiff—Appellee v. Don KEMPER Defendant—Appellant No. 00-3939. United States Court of Appeals, Sixth Circuit. March 20, 2002.

Before BATCHELDER and CLAY, Circuit Judges; and CARR, District Judge.*

The Honorable James G. Carr, United States District Judge for the Northern District of Ohio, sitting by designation.

This cause having come on to be heard upon the record, the briefs and the oral argument of the parties, and upon due consideration thereof,

It is ORDERED that the judgment of the district court be, and it hereby is, affirmed upon the opinion of the district court.
